description:
Easy to load, easy to unload and easy to lock. Using the Helium rack is as simple as gripping the handles and lifting the wheel cages up and over your tires, that’s it. With zero frame contact this rack is safe for carbon fiber frames, from the ultralight road bike to the burliest DH rig. The folding design tucks out of the way when not in use. Or if you need trunk access when your bikes are loaded, you can tilt the rack away from the car.

  • Aluminum construction keeps weight low, making installation and removal easier
  • Fits bikes with wheels between 26 and 29in
  • Compatible with tires up to 3in. wide
  • Space between bikes allows use with multiple bikes with Boost spacing
  • Tool-free installation and removal with Thule® AutoAttach™ system
  • Folds away when not in use, tilts for rear access when loaded
  • Bikes locks to rack, rack locks to vehicle with the same key (2 keys included)
  • Zero frame contact ensures no scratches
  • Side-to-side adjustment ensures clearance
  • Max load is 37.5lb. per tray, 75lb. total
name: Thule Helium Platform 2-Bike Hitch Mount Rack
